officialTitle: Human Menopausal Gonadotropin as a Novel Addition to Luteal Phase Support in Down-regulated ICSI Cycles (RCT)
inclusionCriteria:
* Females undergoing Intra-Cytoplasmic Sperm Injection (ICSI) cycles
* Age between 20 and 40 years
* Must be FEMALE
* Must have minimum age of 20 Years
* Must have maximum age of 40 Years
exclusionCriteria: * Females who have high response (estradiol at time of ovulation trigger is \> 5000 pg/ml or more than 15 oocytes are retrieved)
